name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **AWS** and **Azure** to design robust cloud solutions tailored to client needs. My proficiency in cloud networking and security tools ensures secure, compliant, and efficient architectures. With a solid understanding of **Windows** and **Linux**, I effectively troubleshoot and resolve client issues, promoting seamless integration of technology solutions. I am dedicated to problem-solving and solution design, consistently delivering innovative approaches that align with business goals.
In addition to my cloud expertise, I have a strong background in full-stack development, utilizing technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My hands-on experience in building high-performance applications is complemented by my knowledge of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for enhanced analytics. Also, I understand the importance of maintaining compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 while developing solutions.
